name: Sammy Squid Pants (super early version)
description:
This is a game in super early stage development but I'm really enjoying making and playing it and wanted to see if anyone else would like to have a go :)

Please let me know if you'd be interested in seeing the game developed further.

Keyboard controls:

Level select = 1, 2, 3 or 4 on the keyboard, or + to go to next level, or - to go the previous level.

ESC or Q = exit game, R = restart level

WASD or arrows to move. Down and left or right to walk.

Up, W, Space or Ctrl = jump

shift = dash

Gamepads should also work :)
